department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: Developmental Mechanisms of Evolutionary Change
course.description: This lecture-seminar course will consider how mechanisms of animal developmental genetics help to explain the scope and patterns of animal diversity. Particular emphasis is placed on major evolutionary transitions and the origin of innovations.
course.prerequisites: LS 1A and LS 1B or by permission of the instructor.
